data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Orlando push forward at Toyota Stadium and Nani gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Dallas defence.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 4, Important block from the Dallas defence as Nani fires in a strike for Orlando.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 10, Harold Mosquera gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dallas.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Dallas have a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Dallas's Franco Jara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Harold Mosquera for Dallas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 18, Harold Mosquera for Dallas is back on the field again.
Ramy Touchan awards Dallas a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 19, Dallas's Andres Ricaurte gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orlando defender.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Dallas.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Dallas.
Harold Mosquera, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Fafa Picault is the substitute for Dallas.
Ramy Touchan waits before resuming play because Ruan for Orlando is still down.
In the minute 23, Dallas have a goal kick.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) has taken off Ruan who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Kamal Miller is the replacement.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 24, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Chris Mueller (Orlando) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Dallas defenders.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Dallas needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
Ramy Touchan awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Ramy Touchan signals a Dallas throw-in in Orlando's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas.
In the minute 34, Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ryan Hollingshead (Dallas) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In Frisco, Nani of Orlando is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 36, Ramy Touchan signals a Orlando throw-in in Dallas's half.
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
In Frisco, Tesho Akindele of Orlando is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 37, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Orlando's Nani breaks free at Toyota Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Goal kick for Orlando at Toyota Stadium.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Dallas.
In the minute 39, Can Dallas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
In Frisco, Dallas push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to Dallas's area.
In the minute 41, Throw-in Dallas.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Dallas.
In the minute 44, Throw-in high up the field for Dallas in Frisco.
Dallas's Bryan Acosta is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
In the minute 44, Matt Hedges (Dallas) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In Frisco, Chris Mueller (Orlando) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 45, Ramy Touchan awards Dallas a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 45, Andres Ricaurte (Dallas) gets a yellow card.
The second half has started at Toyota Stadium.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Dallas in the half of Orlando.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
Throw-in Dallas.
In the minute 49, Andres Ricaurte of Dallas gets in a strike, but is off target.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 53, Nani for Orlando drives towards goal at Toyota Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Dallas.
Orlando's Nani gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Dallas defender.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Dallas in their own half.
Dallas are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Franco Jara (Dallas) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 58, Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Frisco.
Can Dallas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Orlando needs to be cautious. Dallas have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 63, Goal kick for Orlando at Toyota Stadium.
The away team replace Tesho Akindele with Daryl Dike.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's third substitution at Toyota Stadium with Benji Michel replacing Chris Mueller.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Dallas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orlando's Jhegson Mendez has been booked in Frisco.
Dallas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Jesus Ferreira is on a sub for Andres Ricaurte for Dallas.
Tanner Tessmann is replacing Bryan Acosta for the home team.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Ramy Touchan signals a Orlando throw-in in Dallas's half.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 69, Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Orlando's Jhegson Mendez has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Bryan Reynolds is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 71, Bryan Reynolds has recovered and rejoins the match in Frisco.
At Toyota Stadium, Dallas are penalized for being offside.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a fourth substitution, with Andres Perea replacing Mauricio Pereyra.
In the minute 74, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nani for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 75, Dallas have a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan awards Orlando a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Orlando.
In Frisco Orlando drive forward through Junior Urso. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
In the minute 81, Nani (Orlando) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Dallas territory.
In the minute 83, Dallas's Michael Barrios gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orlando defender.
Corner awarded to Dallas.
Dallas drive upfield and Michael Barrios gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orlando defender.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Dallas.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frisco.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Thiago Santos for Dallas has been booked by Ramy Touchan and receives a first yellow card.
The match at Toyota Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Robin Jansson, who is down injured.
Free kick Orlando.
In the minute 89, Ricardo Pepi is replacing Michael Barrios for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
Robin Jansson is back on the pitch.
Nani (Orlando) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dallas's half?
Goal kick for Dallas at Toyota Stadium.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Dallas in Frisco.
Dallas are coming forward and Thiago Santos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ramy Touchan awards Orlando a goal kick.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Orlando.
Ball goes out of play for a Dallas goal kick.
Orlando’s Benji Michel is on his feet again at Toyota Stadium.
Goal kick for Orlando at Toyota Stadium.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Dallas in their own half.
In Frisco a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dallas have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
Benji Michel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Nani (Orlando) has received a first yellow card.
